Rising to the Challenge of Connectivity: Satcom Solutions
Dear Customer,
The revolution in connectivity is providing unprecedented opportunities to improve mission critical communications and information sharing. However, it is also a complex and challenging landscape to navigate.
Honeywell has a number of satcom solutions designed to make connecting your missions simple and straightforward. Our solutions are flexible, reliable and, most importantly, fast.
We offer satcom hardware solutions for fixed and rotory wing applications that connect to both Iridium and Inmarsat L-band and Ka-band networks, as well as our GoDirectTM airtime services, tools and routers – designed to enable you to take control of the network and the costs associated. We also provide a broad portfolio of connected services which deliver reductions in cost, downtime and unscheduled maintenance events. Our breadth of capability means we are uniquely placed to customize the right solution for your mission requirements, as well as your budget.
Let us help find the right satcom solution for you – organise a briefing with one of our experts today!
